mapper.insert: INSERT INTO itemgiftcard(item_no, item_name, item_type, item_price, item_size, item_info, image_uuid) VALUES (item_seq.nextval, #{itemName}, #{itemType}, #{itemPrice}, #{itemSize}, #{itemInfo}, #{imageUuid})
mapper.update: UPDATE itemgiftcard SET item_name = #{itemName}, item_type = #{itemType}, item_price = #{itemPrice}, item_size = #{itemSize}, item_info = #{itemInfo}, image_uuid = #{imageUuid} WHERE item_no = #{itemNo}
mapper.select: SELECT a.* from (SELECT a.*, rownum rn from ( SELECT * from itemgiftcard order by item_no desc) a where rownum <= #{end} ) a where rn >= #{start}
